input_data.title: Dig
input_data.overview: When FBI Agent Peter Connelly, recently stationed in Jerusalem, begins investigating the murder of a young American, he realizes that he’s uncovered an ancient international conspiracy that threatens to change the course of human history. Certain that the dangerous prophecy is nearing fruition, Peter must race against the clock to unravel its mystery. From a remote farm in Norway, to an enigmatic compound in New Mexico, to the serpentine tunnels of Jerusalem, he searches for the truth, the revelation of which will shake the world's beliefs to its very core.

response.analytical_summary: Dig is a mystery drama series centered on an FBI agent investigating a murder that unravels a vast, ancient conspiracy. The show blends elements of procedural crime drama with a supernatural thriller, exploring themes of faith, history, and the potential for hidden truths to reshape our understanding of the world. Its narrative unfolds across international locations, creating a sense of global intrigue and escalating stakes. The series aims to deliver a suspenseful and intellectually stimulating experience, prompting viewers to question established beliefs and confront the possibility of hidden forces at play.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with FBI Agent Peter Connelly being assigned to investigate the murder of a young woman in Jerusalem. As he delves deeper, he discovers a connection to an ancient prophecy and a secretive organization known as the 'Ministers.' Peter's investigation leads him on a global chase, uncovering a complex web of historical events and hidden symbols. He is aided by his estranged wife, Debra, a journalist who initially doubts his theories but gradually becomes involved in the investigation. The Ministers appear to be manipulating events to fulfill the prophecy, which foretells a catastrophic event. Peter and Debra uncover evidence linking the Ministers to a series of historical incidents, suggesting a long-standing effort to control the course of human history. The investigation takes them from Norway to New Mexico, revealing a network of hidden compounds and underground tunnels. As Peter gets closer to the truth, he faces increasing danger and must confront his own personal demons and the possibility that the prophecy is about to come to pass, threatening to reshape the world’s understanding of its past and future.
response.keyword_sentence: Dig is a suspenseful mystery drama series that explores themes of faith and ancient history through an international conspiracy investigation, set against a backdrop of modern-day locations and underground complexes.
